column4: omg this is the second time this has happened to me ... i did a net install of the dapper i386 iso and for the second time, AFTER downloading and installation the screen HANGS. it's a black screen with what looks like to be two small white blocks on either side of the screen against a black background
and what's worse is that it leaves 0 partitions active after it!! now i'm in knoppix and i used qtparted to set hda2 back to active
does anyone know how to resolve this problem?
I have nothing productive to add. But that sounds like pong!
